identity.philosophy: Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First. Content is King.
identity.vibe: Electric Utility - Clean, precise, but with kinetic energy.

typography.instructions: Use 'Outfit' for all headings. Use 'DM Sans' for body text. Use 'JetBrains Mono' for dates, times, and data metrics.

gradients.glass_surface: bg-white/70 dark:bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 dark:border-white/10

layout.spacing_scale: Generous. Use p-6, p-8, p-12. Avoid cramped p-2 or p-4 for main containers.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-6 rounded-md font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 rounded-md transition-colors
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-6 rounded-md transition-colors

cards.base: rounded-xl border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm
cards.glass: bg-white/50 dark:bg-black/50 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/20 dark:border-white/10

inputs.base: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

visual_enhancers.borders: Use 1px borders with subtle colors. Avoid thick borders.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Use 'shadow-sm' for cards, 'shadow-lg' for floating elements. Avoid heavy drop shadows.
visual_enhancers.radius: rounded-xl for cards, rounded-md for buttons/inputs.
visual_enhancers.glassmorphism: Use for sticky headers and floating navigation.
visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Use for the 'Current Study Session' active card.

login_hero.alt: Student focused on studying in a library

general: Do not use generic centered layouts.
Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
All interactive elements MUST include data-testid attribute.
components: Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui.
forbidden: Do not use Teal (#1B93A4) for dashboards.
Do not use AI assistant emojis.

instructions_to_main_agent: Follow these guidelines strictly. Implement the 'Electric Swiss' theme. Use the provided image URLs. Ensure the app feels like a premium tool for engineering students, not a generic admin panel.
